title: GO SMS Pro Summer Beach Theme
creator: Themes Architect

extendedInfo.description: Holiday application to send SMS messages with motifs of summer and the summer holidays. Colorful applique on this holiday. Background shows the main menu sms sea, the beach and the redhead girl in blue swimsuit, every text message from your friend has a motif of a small sun, sender names are black, the content of an SMS is gray. Background sms conversations in the beach, sea water. Sun bed and sun umbrella, texting window background is white and transparent, the content of text messages in gray, each SMS is in your corner of the image of the holidays and themes associated with the summer as shells, starfish and ice cream, the other elements are in turquoise. When you click on any text message you open white, transparent window in the yellow box, which bears the inscription colorful summer holiday activities with themes like the sun, sunglasses and ice cream, the name of the sender is in black with the motif of the sun, the other elements are in turquoise. Holidays can get started right now on your phone, enter into your life a little color and joy because this is our application kolorwa and positive, as summer and holidays are a joyous time for all time play, carefree and relaxing, summer means more opportunities for new ideas. Download the app for free holiday.Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:-  at thee foreground of your messages list stays beautiful redhead lady. Background shows beach and sea- compose message window have a sunshade as wallpaper- changed messages text color. It's will be great to read while you will be on vacations.- pop up window with the same fabulous, red heartHow to run our theme:1. Download our Summer Beach Theme for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Summer Beach Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language.
